Key Match Events: Lionel Messi scored the second goal for Argentina
Julian Alvarez scored the opening goal for Argentina
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi praised the team's achievement and acknowledged the challenges faced during the tournament
Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni expressed his satisfaction with the team's performance and mentioned the possibility of Messi returning for the 2026 World Cup final
Canada coach Jesse Marsch acknowledged the difficulties his team faced, including fatigue and strategy deviations
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in East Rutherford, New Jersey
The weather conditions were hot with an 82-degree temperature and 82% humidity
Alphonso Davies limped off in the 71st minute due to a clean challenge with Gonzalo Montiel
